title: Gross premiums written by leading reinsurers in the U.S. 2018
summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Insurer, and Amount in billion U.S. dollars in each Insurer on the y axis.
The Amount in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Insurer National Indemnity Company and lowest at Insurer EMC Reinsurance Company.
The highest Insurer National Indemnity Company has 26.96 more Amount in billion U.S. dollars than the lowest Insurer EMC Reinsurance Company.
